import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import avatar from '../assets/profile.png' import { Toaster } from 'react-hot-toast' import { useFormik } from 'formik' import { usernameValidate } from '../helpers/validate' import { useAuthStore } from '../store/store' import styles from '../styles/Username.module.css'; export default function Username() { const setUsername = useAuthStore(state => console.log(state.auth.setUsername)) const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { username: '' }, validate: usernameValidate, validateOnBlur: false, validateOnChange: false, onSubmit: async values => { console.log(values); } }) return (
